Job.Command:
echo "Auger ID: $AUGER_ID"
ln -s /u/group/hps/hps_soft/fieldmaps fieldmap
set dz = `${param_dir}/dz.csh ${ebeam}` set ne = `${param_dir}/ne.csh ${ebeam}` set ebeam = `${param_dir}/ebeam.csh ${ebeam}`
ln -s ${egs5_dir}/data ln -s ${exe_dir}/src/esa.inp pgs5job.pegs5inp
@ event_num = ( ${num} - 1 ) % 1000 + 1
source /u/group/hps/hps_soft/setup_dst.csh
${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords ap_tc_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep rot_ap_tc_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep -s 20${num} -z -5.0 ${stdhep_dir}/beam_coords ap_displaced_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep rot_ap_displaced_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep -s 21${num} -z -5.0
bash -c 'source ${slic_dir}/init_ilcsoft.sh; exec csh' source ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03/geant4make.csh ${slic_dir}/geant4/build-10.01.p03 setenv GDML_SCHEMA_DIR "/u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/schemas" ln -s /u/group/hps/hps_soft/fieldmaps fieldmap
set seed = 22 set nevents = 0
# cp /u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/HEAD/slic/HEAD/data/particle.tbl /u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/HEAD/slic/HEAD/data/particle_copy.tbl # sed -i 's/.*622 A^1.*/ 622 A^1 0 ${apmass}.0e-03 0.000000 0.00000E+00/' particle_copy.tbl
echo "${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/bin/slic -P /u/group/hps/hps_soft/slic/REL/slic/v05-00-01/data/particle.tbl -i rot_ap_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out_ap_${apmass}_${num}.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000"
echo "Running the target-constrained A's..."
${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/bin/slic -P ${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/data/particle.tbl -i rot_ap_tc_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out_ap_tc_${apmass}_${num}.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000|grep -vE '^$|^>>>> .+Event <[0-9]+>$| has [0-9]+ hits$'
echo "Now running the displaced A's..."
${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/bin/slic -P ${slic_dir}/slic/v05-00-01/data/particle.tbl -i rot_ap_displaced_${apmass}_${num}.stdhep -g ${det_dir}/${detector}/${detector}.lcdd -o out_ap_displaced_${apmass}_${num}.slcio -d$seed{${num}} -r5000000|grep -vE '^$|^>>>> .+Event <[0-9]+>$| has [0-9]+ hits$'
/apps/scicomp/java/jdk1.7/bin/java -Xmx100m -jar ${hps-java} -r /org/lcsim/hps/steering/DataQuality.lcsim -i out_ap_tc_${apmass}_${num}.slcio >! data_quality.txt set nevents=`grep '^Read.*events$' data_quality.txt | cut -d' ' -f2` echo "$nevents events in output" @ seed = $seed + 1
